DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study provide efficacy safety data monthly ranibizumab 0.5 mg intravitreal injection Chinese patient subfoveal choroidal neovascularization ( CNV ) secondary age-related macular degeneration ( AMD ) . The study result support regulatory submission China make ranibizumab available clinical use .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Safety Efficacy Once Monthly Ranibizumab Injections Chinese Patients With Wet Age Related Macular Degeneration ( AMD ) Patients
DOC.criteria: Male female Chinese patient 50 year age great . Patients primary recurrent subfoveal CNV secondary AMD . Patients BCVA score 73 24 character study eye . Active , history , ocular inflammation infection study eye within last 30 day . Uncontrolled glaucoma study eye . Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
